# Week 12

Stan introduction via brms

```{r}
#| echo: TRUE
#| message: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE
#| error: FALSE

library(brms)
library(tidyverse)

# simulate
set.seed(123)
n <- 100
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- 2*x + rnorm(n)
data <- data.frame(x, y)

# fit
fit <- brm(y ~ x, data = data, chains = 2, iter = 500)
summary(fit)

```

```{r}
#| echo: TRUE
#| message: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE
#| error: FALSE
#| class-output: stan

# extract stan code from brms

writeLines(stancode(fit))
```
